Chill . ”[0-i] [I]0-i turned around and made [my]0-i way to [[my]0-i office]4255-my office , laughing . [I]0-i totally meant pussy . The End

This has been such a special book for [me]0-i to write . [Hunter Fitzpatrick]122-hunter was supposed to be nothing but a side character in All Saints High . Before [you]3703-you leave , here is the first chapter of Pretty Reckless , book one in the All Saints High series . Find all about [Vaughn]131-vaughn , [Knight]128-knight , [Daria]441-daria and [their]3708-their stories !

It started with a lemonade And ended with [my]0-i heart This , [[my]0-i pretty reckless rival]3709-my pretty reckless rival , is how [our]3710-our screwed - up story starts Age Fourteen .

The tiles under [my]0-i feet shake as a herd of ballerinas blazes past [me]0-i , [their]3711-their feet pounding like artillery in the distance . Brown hair . Black hair . Straight hair . Red hair . Curly hair . [They]3712-they blur into a rainbow of trims and scrunchies . [My]0-i eyes are searching for the blond head [I]0-i ’d like to bash against the well - worn floor . Feel free not to be here today , [Queen Bitch]3713-queen bitch . [I]0-i stand frozen on the threshold of [[[my]0-i mother]660-my mother ’s ballet studio]3715-my mother ’s ballet studio , [my]0-i pale pink leotard sticking to [my]0-i ribs . [My]0-i white duffel bag dangles from [my]0-i shoulder . [My]0-i tight bun makes [my]0-i scalp burn . Whenever [I]0-i let [my]0-i hair down , [my]0-i golden locks fall off in chunks on the bathroom floor . [I]0-i tell [Mom]171-mom it ’s from messing with [my]0-i hair too much , but that ’s [BS]307-bs . And if [she]171-mom gave a damn — really gave one , not just pretended to — [she’d]171-mom know this , too . [I]0-i wiggle [my]0-i banged - up toes in [my]0-i pointe shoes , swallowing the ball of anxiety in [my]0-i throat . [Via]442-via is n’t [here]3999-here . Thank [you]3717-you , [Marx]443-marx . [Girls]4187-girls torpedo past [me]0-i , bumping into [my]0-i shoulders . [I]0-i feel [their]4187-girls giggles in [my]0-i empty stomach . [My]0-i duffel bag falls with a thud . [[My]0-i classmates]3719-my classmates are leaner , longer , and more flexible with rod - straight backs like an exclamation mark . [Me]0-i ? [I]0-i ’m small and muscular like a question mark . Always unsure and on the verge of snapping . [My]0-i face is not stoic and regal ; it ’s traitorous and unpredictable . [Some]4011-some wear [their]4011-some hearts on [their]4011-some sleeves — [I]0-i wear mine on [my]0-i mouth . [I]0-i smile with [my]0-i teeth when [I]0-i ’m happy , and when [[my]0-i mom]4037-my mom looks at [me]0-i , [I]0-i ’m always happy . “ [You]0-i should really take gymnastics or cheer , [Lovebug]444-lovebug . There ’s a rounded dent on its surface now , the shape of [her]171-mom words , and that ’s where [I]0-i keep [my]0-i anger .
